target.mrk: <uicontrol>梱包</uicontrol>画面にナビゲートします。
<uicontrol>梱包</uicontrol>画面では、以下を実行することができます。

trans-unit.source: The <uicontrol>Packing</uicontrol> screen allows you to manage handling units (HUs) more extensively, including nested HUs. Nested HUs are handling units that have been packed into other handling units, for example, multiple cartons packed in a box.

seg-source.mrk: The <uicontrol>Packing</uicontrol> screen allows you to manage handling units (HUs) more extensively, including nested HUs.
Nested HUs are handling units that have been packed into other handling units, for example, multiple cartons packed in a box.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>梱包</uicontrol>画面では、階層構造荷役単位を含め、荷役単位 (HU) をより広範囲に管理することができます。
階層構造荷役単位は、箱に梱包された複数のカートンなど、他の荷役単位に梱包された荷役単位です。

trans-unit.source: On the left-hand side of the <uicontrol>Packing</uicontrol> screen, you can view the HU hierarchy, and pack, unpack or repack products or HUs by dragging and dropping them into an HU or separate HU. You can use a keyboard or a scanner - provided the necessary information is available as a bar code - for the same purpose in the tabs on the upper right-hand side of the screen. You can create, change, and delete HUs, including nested HUs.

seg-source.mrk: On the left-hand side of the <uicontrol>Packing</uicontrol> screen, you can view the HU hierarchy, and pack, unpack or repack products or HUs by dragging and dropping them into an HU or separate HU.
You can use a keyboard or a scanner - provided the necessary information is available as a bar code - for the same purpose in the tabs on the upper right-hand side of the screen.
You can create, change, and delete HUs, including nested HUs.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>梱包</uicontrol>画面の左側で、HU 階層を表示し、製品または荷役単位を荷役単位または個別の荷役単位にドラッグ & ドロップして梱包、開梱、または再梱包することができます。
同じ目的で画面の右上にあるタブでも、必要な情報がバーコードとして利用可能であれば、キーボードまたはスキャナを使用することができます。
階層構造荷役単位を含む荷役単位を登録、変更、および削除することができます。

trans-unit.source: On the right-hand screen area, you can edit or request detailed information about the HUs and products.

seg-source.mrk: On the right-hand screen area, you can edit or request detailed information about the HUs and products.

target.mrk: 右側の画面領域で、荷役単位および製品に関する詳細情報を編集または依頼することができます。

trans-unit.source: Create and assign serial numbers to an HU for a product with a stock-level serialization requirement

seg-source.mrk: Create and assign serial numbers to an HU for a product with a stock-level serialization requirement

target.mrk: 在庫レベルのシリアル番号化要件がある製品の荷役単位にシリアル番号を登録して割り当てます。

trans-unit.source: If you want to create an HU for a product that has a stock-level serialization requirement, you need to create the HU on the <uicontrol>Packing</uicontrol> screen and assign the serial number to the stock packed into the HU there.

seg-source.mrk: If you want to create an HU for a product that has a stock-level serialization requirement, you need to create the HU on the <uicontrol>Packing</uicontrol> screen and assign the serial number to the stock packed into the HU there.

target.mrk: 在庫レベルのシリアル番号化要件がある製品に対して荷役単位を登録する場合は、<uicontrol>梱包</uicontrol>画面で荷役単位を登録し、そこで荷役単位に梱包された在庫にシリアル番号を割り当てる必要があります。

trans-unit.source: If an HU already exists for a product with a stock-level serialization requirement, and you want to make any changes to the HU or its contents, you need to make them on the <uicontrol>Packing</uicontrol> screen.

seg-source.mrk: If an HU already exists for a product with a stock-level serialization requirement, and you want to make any changes to the HU or its contents, you need to make them on the <uicontrol>Packing</uicontrol> screen.

target.mrk: 在庫レベルのシリアル番号化要件がある製品に対して荷役単位がすでに存在し、荷役単位またはその内容に変更を加える場合は、<uicontrol>梱包</uicontrol>画面で変更を加える必要があります。
